com.esri.mo2.data.qb
Class BasePreParser

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.data.qb.BasePreParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
PreParser
public class BasePreParser
extends Object
implements PreParser

This class is a basic implementation of a PreParser and can be used to replace TimeStamps with a date string produced by the com.esri.mo2.util.Date.toString method. It also provides static helper methods for parsing, quoting, and encoding a Date value.

See Also:
Date

Method Detail

substitute

public String substitute(String name,
                         String value)
                  throws ParseException
Description copied from interface: PreParser
When a macro is detected, QueryEnvironment's preparse method will call this method to request an appropiate substitution.

Specified by:
substitute in interface PreParser
Parameters:
name - the macro name, e.g. ts for time-stamp
value - the macro value, e.g. if the macro is {ts 'xxx'} then "xxx" is the value
Returns:
the substitution value if possible, or throws an exception
Throws:
ParseException - if the macro value cannot be parsed
